name: Stalkerbook - Revert Games Feed
description:
April 2014 a lot of people got hit with an "update" that changed the feed to have HUGE pictures on Games posts and tiny ALL CAPS descriptions that are cut off.

This tweak reverts the posts feed to a more reasonable view.
additional_info: v0.1 - shrink games icon-picture-things to 75px squared, revert the all-caps in descriptions and take up less vertical space.https://www.facebook.com/
